item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Biden allows Ukraine to strike Russia with US-made long-range missiles
2. Singapore oil trader sentenced to 17 years for ‘cheating’ HSBC over $112mn
3. Stealth sackings: why do employers fire staff for minor misdemeanours?
4. Germany and Finland ‘deeply concerned’ about severed undersea cable
5. [Opinion] Trump’s attack on the enemy within will delight America’s real foes
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
